articles.title: Talks between DPRK and Russia Held
articles.content:
Talks between DPRK and Russia Held 
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Talks between Ri Ryong Nam, minister of External Economic Relations who is chairman of the DPRK side to the Inter-governmental Committee for Cooperation in Trade and Economy, Science and Technology, and Alexandr Galushka, minister of the Development of Far East, who is chairman of the Russian side to the committee, were held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday.
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were officials concerned and from the Russian side members of the Russian government delegation, Alexandr Matsegora, Russian Ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The talks discussed the matters of boosting cooperation in economy and trade between the two countries.

articles.title: Talks Held between WPK Delegation and URP Delegation
articles.content:
Talks Held between WPK Delegation and URP Delegation 
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Talks between a delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea and a delegation of the United Russia Party (URP) were held here on Tuesday.
					 Present at the talks from the WPK side were Secretary Kim Ki Nam, Vice Department Director Ri Yong Chol and other officials of the WPK Central Committee and from the URP side were members of the delegation of the URP headed by Andrei Klimov, member of the Standing Committee of the General Council of the URP and vice-chairman of the International Affairs Committee of the Federation Council, and staff members of the Russian embassy here.
					
					 They discussed a series of issues of mutual concern.
					
					 Then a protocol on negotiations on cooperation between the two parties was signed.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from United Russia Party
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from United Russia Party
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by the United Russia Party.
					 Andrei Klimov, member of the Standing Committee of the General Council of the party and vice-chairman of the International Affairs Committee of the Federation Council, handed the gift to Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Tuesday.  Andrei Klimov is heading a delegation of the United Russia Party on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: AP President Departs
articles.content:
AP President Departs
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- AP President Gary Pruitt left here on Tuesday after attending the AP photo exhibit for marking the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: WPK Central Committee Gives Reception in Honor of United Russia Party Delegation
articles.content:
WPK Central Committee Gives Reception in Honor of United Russia Party Delegation 
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea gave a reception on Tuesday in honor of the visiting delegation of the United Russia Party.
					 Present there on invitation were members of the delegation led by Andrei Klimov, member of the Standing Committee of the General Council of the party and vice-chairman of the International Affairs Committee of the Federation Council, and Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK. 
					
					 Present there were Secretary Kim Ki Nam, Vice Department Director Ri Yong Chol and officials of the C.C., the WPK.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam said in his speech that the talks held between the two parties and the signing of the protocol would mark a new milestone in the development of relations between the WPK and the United Russia Party and an important occasion of putting spurs to the development of the DPRK-Russia friendly and cooperative relations. 
					
					 He noted that the WPK would invariably preserve and develop the traditional DPRK-Russia friendly relations provided by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Andrei Klimov said that the WPK has covered a proud road of the struggle for the country's freedom, independence and development over the past seven decades.
					
					 This year, the peoples of the two countries successfully marked the year of friendship, he said, adding that a protocol on negotiations for cooperation between the two parties was signed as the result of the first high-level contact between them.

articles.title: Russian Political Party Delegation Tours Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Russian Political Party Delegation Tours Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the United Russia Party headed by Andrei Klimov, member of the Standing Committee of the General Council of the party and vice-chairman of the International Affairs Committee of the Federation Council, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Tuesday.
					  Being briefed on the revolutionary career of the President, the members of the delegation looked round the historic relics preserved at the old home in Mangyongdae with much care.
					
					 The head of the delegation said that he could know well about the exploits of the President who founded the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and its origin.
					
					 He added that he was deeply impressed by the fact that the Korean people were preserving the old home well so that it might contribute to educating the younger generation.
					
					 The delegation also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea.

articles.title: DPRK Government Hosts Reception
articles.content:
DPRK Government Hosts Reception 
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The government of the DPRK gave a reception Tuesday in connection with the close of the year of DPRK-Russia friendship.
					 Present there on invitation were a Russian government delegation led by Alexandr Galushka, minister of Development of Far East, a delegation of the United Russia Party headed by Andrei Klimov, member of the Standing Committee of the General Council of the party and vice-chairman of the International Affairs Committee of the Federation Council, Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Present there were Ri Ryong Nam, minister of External Economic Relations, Pak Myong Guk, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, and officials concerned.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from All Progressive Congress of Nigeria
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from All Progressive Congress of Nigeria
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a floral basket by the All Progressive Congress of Nigeria on Sunday the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: DPRK Players Prove Successful at Asian Judo Championships
articles.content:
DPRK Players Prove Successful at Asian Judo Championships
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- DPRK judokas won two gold medals, five silver medals and a bronze medal at the 9th the Asian Junior Judo Championship and the 16th Asian Youth Judo Championship.
					 Those championships held in Thailand from Oct. 9 to 12 brought together at least 330 male and female judokas from 27 countries and regions including the DPRK, India, Mongolia and Kazakhstan.
					
					 Jon Su Song grabbed a gold medal by beating her Mongolian and Kazakh rivals in the female 40 kg category event of the junior championship.
					
					 Choe Chung Song and Ri Yu Gyong bagged silver medals in the male 60 kg category event and female 44 kg category event while Chae Kwang Jin came third in the male 50 kg category event of the same championship.
					
					 Jo Son Hyang placed first by trouncing her Indian and Japanese rivals in the female 44 kg category event of the youth championship.
					
					 O Son Hui, Ji Un Ha and Kim Jin A took silver medals in the female 48 kg, 52 kg and 63 kg category events of the same championship.

articles.title: Second Game between DPRK and Yemeni Teams Held
articles.content:
Second Game between DPRK and Yemeni Teams Held
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- There took place at Kim Il Sung Stadium on Tuesday the second game between the DPRK and Yemeni teams for the second stage of the preliminaries of the Asian region of the 2018 FIFA World Cup.
					 The DPRK team beat its Yemeni rival 1:0.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Accelerating General Advance
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Accelerating General Advance
						
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- It was the greatest honor and a significant event promising a final victory that the DPRK celebrated with splendor the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) while making a dynamic advance to usher in a new era of Juche revolution under the guidance of the great party.
					Rodong Sinmun on Tuesday observes this in an editorial.
					
					The70th founding anniversary of the WPK was a grand glorious festival as it strikingly demonstrated the validity and invincibility of the cause of President Kim Il Sung's and leader Kim Jong Il's party, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					The loud shouts of hurrah the servicepersons and people made in chorus at the square celebrating the October festival were hurrah for singled-minded unity which could be raised only by them fully determined to make any long journey following the Party Central Committee out of their intense loyalty and obligation towards the leader.
					
					The leader trusts the people while they single-mindedly trust and follow him. This single-minded unity is unbreakable.
					
					Victory is the everlasting tradition of Songun Korea and making a leap forward with dynamism is the spirit of the prospering country.
					
					It is ascribable to the outstanding wisdom and energetic leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un that the party, army and people in the DPRK could celebrate the 70th anniversary of the party founding with splendor.
					
					The WPK's 70th anniversary will go down in history as a historical event held in praise of Kim Jong Un's undying exploits and his personality as a great man.
					
					The servicepersons and people of the DPRK led by Kim Jong Un are fully determined to bring victories and honor on the road of Juche they are covering under the leadership of the Party Central Committee.
					
					The editorial calls for making a dynamic advance towards the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of building a thriving nation in the same spirit as what they displayed in the drive for greeting the 70th birthday of the party as victors under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: U.S. Should Be Brought to Justice for Its Grave Human Rights Abuses: Minju Joson
articles.content:
U.S. Should Be Brought to Justice for Its Grave Human Rights Abuses: Minju Joson
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- It was reported that a fighter of the U.S. forces hell-bent on "war on terrorism" on Oct. 3 bombed a hospital in Kunduz City, northern part of Afghanistan, killing more than 20 innocent civilians and wounding about 40 others.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 U.S. forces' ceaseless killing of civilians in different parts of the world including Afghanistan is another proof that the U.S. is the world's worst human rights abuser.
					
					 The U.S. is utterly indifferent to such things as international law. It, therefore, kills people in other countries as easily as it does flies.
					
					 That is why GIs present in different countries regard man-killing as their pleasure and make no scruple of perpetrating human rights abuses in various parts of the world. 
					
					 Fin-de-siecle way of life such as misanthropy and immorality and corruption is prevalent in the American society.
					
					 These high profile human rights abuses are openly committed in the international arena. This tragic development should never be allowed in the international community.
					
					 The U.S. hideous human rights abuses should be brought to the international criminal court and the U.S. deserves a stern punishment by justice and human conscience.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Opens to Public Japanese Map Marking Tok Islet as Part of Korea's Territory
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Opens to Public Japanese Map Marking Tok Islet as Part of Korea's Territory
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A representative of the Forum for Studying Tok Islet in south Korea at a meeting held under the sponsorship of the Association for Studying and Preserving Tok Islet on Oct. 8 opened to public map on which Japan marked Tok Islet as part of Korea's territory early in the 1950s.
					 In 1951 the Coast Guard Agency of Japan submitted to the Diet "a map to be used as a reference to Japan's territory" on which half a circle was drawn on the right side of Tok Islet apart from the boundary line between the Korean Peninsula and Japan to denote that the islet belonged to Korea.
					
					 In May 1952, a major newspaper of Japan produced and distributed the "map of Japan's territory", another map marking the islet as part of Korea's territory.
					
					 The representative of the forum stressed that the then Japanese government and the Diet recognized the islet as part of Korea's territory.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Germany
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Organizes and Guides All the Victories of Our People" was brought out in booklet by a German publishing house.
					 The work published on Oct. 3, Juche 79 (1990) deals with the idea that the leadership of the party is the decisive guarantee for the victory of the socialist cause and clarifies the matter of developing the Workers' Party of Korea into the Juche-type revolutionary party and the basic way of performing the mission and duty of the party as the political body of the leadership.
					
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on Oct. 7.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Indonesia
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" was published in booklet by an Indonesian publishing house on October 5.
					 The work published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012) clarifies the essence of leader Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his noble life characterized by his love for the country and its people.
					
					 The work also clarifies the issues arising in applying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter Published in Laos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter Published in Laos
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's letter "Let Us Usher in the Period of Great Prosperity in Construction by Thoroughly Embodying Party's Idea on Juche-based Architecture" which was sent to the participants in the 1st great workshop on construction was published in pamphlet by the Lao State Publishing House on October 5.
					 The work published on December 8, Juche 102 (2013) clarifies the idea that the history of the construction in the DPRK is a proud history that has brought out miracles and changes thanks to the outstanding idea on architecture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and their wise leadership.
					
					 It indicates the task and ways arising in the field of the construction.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Celebrated in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in Dushanbe of Tajikistan and Erfurt of Germany and by the National Women's Union of Mexico and the Pyongyang Cultural Interchange Center in Mexico from Oct. 2 to 5 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the DPRK, who believed in the people as in heaven worked heart and soul to build the WPK into the party deeply rooted among the popular masses.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il made the WPK develop into the mother party.
					
					 Thanks to the wise guidance of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il the WPK could demonstrate victory and glory, forming a harmonious whole with the people.
					
					 The chairman of the Communist Party of Germany noted that the 70-year history of the WPK is the days of victory and glory when it instilled conviction, hope and optimism into the world revolutionaries and progressives.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Under the guidance of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il the WPK developed into the true mother party struggling to meet the people's interests.
					
					 They published many famous works, clearly indicating the way of accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 Their works serve as textbooks for our life and struggle and must books.
					
					 The chairwoman of the National Women's Union of Mexico stressed that the Korean people are dynamically advancing while working world-startling miracles and innovations under the leadership of the WPK led by Marshal Kim Jong Un. Rosy is the future of the DPRK, she added. 
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings held in Tajikistan and Mexico.

articles.title: Guinean Media Praise WPK
articles.content:
Guinean Media Praise WPK
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A newspaper and broadcasting service of Guinea carried an article and aired a special program on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The paper Horoya on Oct. 1 in an article titled "WPK has led the people for 70 years" said:
					
					 The WPK founded on Oct. 10, 1945 has led the people to victory while weathering all storms and trials of history.
					
					 It has led the people to build a prospering socialist state.
					
					 Under its guidance the DPRK, the first people's democratic state in the East, was built on September 9, 1948.
					
					 After the Korean war ignited by the U.S. imperialists the WPK led the people to wind up the rehabilitation and construction on the debris in a short span of time and built a socialist industrial state.
					
					 Popular policies such as free healthcare and free education have been enforced in the DPRK under the leadership of the party.
					
					 Under its guidance the DPRK has won victory only in ceaseless politico-military confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 Domestic, International and Seven National Languages Broadcasting Services aired the program under the title "Party praised by people" on Oct. 2.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The Korean people could lead an independent and creative life for the first time in the national history spanning five thousand years under the care of the party and keenly realized how dear the party is through their life experience.
					
					 The WPK is working hard to materialize all the ideals and dreams of the people, holding aloft the banner of the people-first principle.
					
					 The WPK is sure to always triumph like a deeply rooted tree remaining unshaken in any storm and stress as it enjoys absolute support and trust from the people.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Marked in Nigeria
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Marked in Nigeria
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Nigeria on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 Korean book and photo exhibitions and film shows were held by the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria, Kim Jong Il Library of Enugu State, Nigerian companies and hospitals in Zamfara State between September 30 and October 6. 
					
					 Displayed at the venues were photos dealing with exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed for founding the Workers' Party of Korea and developing it.
					
					 On display there were books and photos introducing successes achieved by the army and people of the DPRK in the struggle for accomplishing the reunification and building a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "Tower of the Juche Idea" and the "Monument to Party Founding."

articles.title: Lectures in Different Countries Mark WPK's Birthday
articles.content:
Lectures in Different Countries Mark WPK's Birthday
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given in Mexico, Angola and Uganda on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there were personages of the Mexican parliament, a Mexican party, the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Artists Union of Angola, an elevator factory of Angola, the Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Makerere University of Uganda, the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement and masses. 
					
					 The president of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said that President Kim Il Sung built the Korean-style people's democratic power, not following other's style, and firmly adhered to the line of independence in politics, self-support in economy and self-reliance in national defence, rejecting revisionism and dogmatism.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung regarded it as his motto to believe in the people as in heaven and pushed ahead with the revolution and construction by arousing the popular masses.
					
					 The DPRK could win victory only in the struggle against the imperialist allied forces' moves to stifle it as it achieved single-minded unity of the leader, party and masses.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Makerere University of Uganda noted that the immortal leadership exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, eternal leaders of the Korean people, for party-building are precious things from which the African countries should learn for revolutionary party building and activities.

articles.title: WPK Praised by Thai Body, Myanmar Personage
articles.content:
WPK Praised by Thai Body, Myanmar Personage
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A Thailand body and Myanmar personage separately made public statements on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association in its statement said that the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung, eternal leader of the Korean people, is demonstrating its might as an invincible party.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 Under the guidance of the great leaders the WPK has dynamically advanced along the road chosen by itself without any vacillation.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the party which achieved single-minded unity around the leader.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is strengthening the WPK by successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of the preceding leaders.
					
					 The statement expressed belief that the WPK would win steady victory only under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The general director of a publishing house of Myanmar said:
					
					 The 70-year history of the WPK founded and developed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is the one in which it advanced along the road of victory only without any turn and twist thanks to the immortal revolutionary idea and guidance of the outstanding leaders.
					
					 Expressing belief that the WPK would surely accomplish the cause of building a thriving nation and achieving national reunification as desired by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, the general director extended firm support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just cause.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Support Statement of DPRK FM Spokesman
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Support Statement of DPRK FM Spokesman
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- It is the steadfast stand of the DPRK to replace the Armistice Agreement (AA) with a peace treaty.
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on Oct. 7 in support of the statement of a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					
					 The joint statement said:
					
					 The DPRK is working hard to ensure durable peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Peace has not been ensured on the peninsula though over 60 years have passed since the end of the Korean war.
					
					 The U.S. has staged military drills under different codenames in a bid to provoke a new war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 It introduced nuclear weapons into south Korea in violation of the AA.
					
					 The tense situation on the peninsula in August last proved that a war may break out any moment as long as the AA exists.
					
					 We fully support the statement of the spokesman for the DPRK FM which calls for concluding a peace treaty.
					
					 The conclusion of the peace treaty alone can ensure durable peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre delegaciones de PTC y PRU
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre delegaciones de PTC y PRU
						
Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 13 en esta capital las conversaciones entre las delegaciones del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Partido Rusia Unida.
					Estuvieron presentes, por la parte coreana, el secretario Kim Ki Nam, el subjefe de departamento Ri Yong Chol y otros funcionarios del Comite Central del PTC, y por la rusa, la delegacion del PRU encabezada por Andrei Klimov, miembro del comite permanente del Consejo General del PRU y vicepresidente del Comite de Asuntos Internacionales del Consejo de Federacion de Rusia y los miembros de la embajada rusa en Corea.
					
					En la ocasion fue debatida una serie de problemas de interes mutuo.
					
					Acto seguido, fue firmado un protocolo de negociaciones sobre la cooperacion bilateral.

articles.title: Gobierno de RPDC ofrece banquete
articles.content:
Gobierno de RPDC ofrece banquete 
Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ACNC) -- El gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecio el dia 13 un banquete dedicado a la clausura del ano de amistad RPDC-Rusia. 
					Fueron invitados la delegacion gubernamental de Rusia encabezada por Alexandr Galushka, ministro de Desarrollo de Lejano Oriente, la del Partido Rusia Unida presidida por Andrei Klimov, miembro del comite permanente del Consejo General del Partido y vicepresidente del Comite de Asuntos Internacionales del Consejo de Federacion de Rusia, el embajador Alexandr Matsegora y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica rusa en la RPDC. 
					
					Estuvieron presentes Ri Ryong Nam, ministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero, el vicecanciller Pak Myong Guk, Kim Jin Bom, presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Rusia y vicepresidente del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, y otros funcionarios coreanos.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe presente del Partido Rusia Unida
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe presente del Partido Rusia Unida
						
Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio presente que le dirigiera el Partido Rusa Unida.
					El jefe de la delegacion del Partido Rusa Unida, Andrei Klimov, miembro del comite permanente del Consejo General del PRU y vicepresidente del Comite de Asuntos Internacionales del Consejo de Federacion de Rusia, de visita en Corea, lo entrego el dia 13 a Kim Ki Nam, secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.

articles.title: Efectuada competencia de futbol entre equipos de RPDC y Yemen
articles.content:
Efectuada competencia de futbol entre equipos de RPDC y Yemen
						
Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 13 en el Estadio Kim Il Sung el segundo partido de la segunda etapa entre el equipo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el de Yemen en marco de las eliminatorias de la region asiatica para ganar el boleto a la Copa Mundial de la FIFA 2018.
					El equipo coreano vencio a su rival por 1:0.
